title: Why do I always disappoint people? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have 3 things to say: No human is perfect.People always, everyone; have a negatively biasing side as an intellect.No human can be perfect.Humans do wrongs, provided you repent for the mistake, build a trust inside others over time and you aren't making the same sin/mistake again. I have 3 more things to say: To err is human, to forgive is divine. Everyone has the tendency to forgive, depending on individual, time varies.You can't expect gold from a gold fish and be disappointed. Find the right people, accept criticisms, they are like power ups.Chisel yourself from your mistakes. Failures are a stepping stone to success.If you feel you disappoint people, first you yourself realized that you haven't been the way others expected. That is realization. You have realized your fault in your star. So now, you mend it and amend it. Peace!

LOW SELF ESTEEMYour not disappointing people your disappointing yourself Life is complicated.I always feel like i disappoint people and it lowers me down to the dirt, But then i realize I’m here to help and if i tried to help at least I tried.Were not put on this earth to please people were put here to make something of ourselves. Try not to worry so much on what others think and start wondering about what you think if someone says that Shirt is ugly on you and you think you look good wear the shirt your not them so why would you care what others think. I taught my kids this now its everyone else’s turn
